title: Descartes' Square
quadrant1: What will happen if this happens?
quadrant2: What will happen if this does not happen?
quadrant3: What will not happen if this happens?
quadrant4: What will not happen if this does not happen?
hint: The 'Descartes' Square' technique helps you make decisions by considering the situation from four perspectives. Fill in each field to understand the consequences of your actions.
